page.title: 02GUNBY ...II
page.content:
TENURE Total of 47 households/137 population. 17 owner occupied - 55 people live in them. 11 Council etc. - 18 people. 3 rented with business's - 17 people. 6 by virtue of employument - 30 people. 10 Rented lunfurnished - 17 people. No single parent families.
Means of travel to work. 10% sample of such small population shows 1 male car driver, 1 male and 1 female walk to work. Birthplace of Head of Household 100% U.K. STAINBY - population 1881 - 153. Stigandbi in Domes. Book. Stigandi - personal name, therefore his farm - 'bi' - 'by' very common in the Danelaw. (a region of small landowners). Staene - is O.E. for Stony place. Stone still quarried.
